message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but that's a little steep for me.  Would you consider $85?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $85 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $95.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. How about we split the difference and make it $90?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to go up to $98, but that's my final offer. I'm not going to go any higher.
I understand this is your final offer, Alice, but I'm on a tight budget.  I can do $92, but that's the best I can do.
I'm not willing to go below $98, Bob, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you at $95, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
